GSD.description:
NFSD: Fix NFSv3 SETATTR/CREATE's handling of large file sizes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 37f2d2cd8eadddbbd9c7bda327a9393399b2f89b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: Fix NFSv3 SETATTR/CREATE's handling of large file sizes
